Recent Developments Speech by Governor Cook on entrepreneurship and innovation Speech - 10/10/2024 Minutes of the Federal Open Market Committee, September 17-18, 2024 Press Release - 10/9/2024 Speech by Vice Chair Jefferson on the discount window: 1990-Present Speech - 10/9/2024 Speech by Vice Chair Jefferson on the discount window: 1913-2000 Speech - 10/8/2024 Speech by Governor Kugler on global inflation Speech - 10/8/2024 Agencies announce dollar thresholds for smaller loan exemption from appraisal requirements for higher-priced mortgage loans Press Release - 10/4/2024 Agencies announce dollar thresholds for applicability of truth in lending and consumer leasing rules for consumer credit and lease transactions Press Release - 10/4/2024 Federal Reserve Board issues enforcement actions Press Release - 10/3/2024 Accessible Keys for Video [Space Bar] toggles play/pause; [Right/Left Arrows] seeks the video forwards and back (5 sec ); [Up/Down Arrows] increase/decrease volume; [M] toggles mute on/off; [F] toggles fullscreen on/off (Except IE 11); The [Tab] key may be used in combination with the [Enter/Return] key to navigate and activate control buttons, such as caption on/off.
